subject: Standard RFP Document for Procurement of DPR Consultancy Services – Modification in Policy Circular No. 11.57/2024 dated 14.06.2024 for provision of Cattle-Shelter on Project Stretches – reg.
text: YRdly 754 WTHNf gifeazrot (Tsw5 4Rdev & rTHTf HAT4, 4RG TRaR) National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways, Government of India) TrJ T vf-5 ga 6, iaer-10, #RWT, 7f fecft 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka; New Delhi-110075 TI/Phone 91-11-25074100 25074200 NHAII Policy Guidelines/ Standard Documents/ 2025 Policy Circular No:11.65/ 2025 dated 25th February, 2025 {Decision taken on E-Office File No. DPR-12026/1/2024-DPR Cell (Comp. No. 267480)} Sub: Standard RFP Document for Procurement of DPR   Consultancy Services Modification in Policy Circular No. 11.57/2024 dated 14.06.2024 for provision of Cattle-Shelter on Project Stretches reg: NHAI vide Policy Circular No. 11.57/2024 dated 14.06.2024 issued the RFP document for DPR Consultancy Services on Fixed Cost Basis and few amendments have also been issued in the Standard RFP Document vide Policy Circular No. 11.60/2024 dated 05th September, 2024. 2 Further, with a view to improve Safety and avoid Accidents due to Stray Cattle menace on National Highways, some amendments have been approved for incorporating in the ToR of the above standard RFP Document for DPR Consultancy Services. The Amendments are attached as Annexure-A to this Policy Circular. 3 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl: Annexure-A: Amendment to the RFP Document (DPR): 0/25 a5 (CS. Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: AlI Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: Hindi Division for translation in Hindi. 2 . Library for hosting the circular on library site: 3_ Web Admin for circulation. M1 { 7 M NHAL Copy
